com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.components.inventory

Class PagedInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.components.inventory.BaseInventory
      • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.components.inventory.PagedInventory

  • public class PagedInventory
extends BaseInventory
    A PagedInventory is a type of inventory. It has support for pagination, so you can have a multi-paged inventory.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.components.inventory.BaseInventory

      • setTitleFormat

        public void setTitleFormat(@Nonnull
                           java.lang.String titleFormat)
        Sets the format for the inventory title.

        Available placeholders: %title% - replaced with inventory title (defined on object creation) %page% - replaced with page number

        Parameters:
        titleFormat - format
